column4: please how did you setup an in house mail server that would work on the intranet inbound and  work on the internet outbound too.
install postfix, read documentation, ask at #postfix for further help _after_ you read all relevant docs

ytaj l want the mail server to be in house and not on the web anymore so now.. my boss want to build a microsoft mail exchange server but i would prefer to use linux where by the mails would work on the intranet (inbound) and also on the internet (outbound)
